name: Block Dodge (Dead Duck Games)
description:
The aim of the game is a simple one... Dodge the blocks and stay above the bottom.

The game will incrementally get more difficult as time goes by and you rack up the points.

Simple but not so easy.

The controls are as follows:

Move: Arrow Keys or Hold the Left Mouse Button.

Boost: Double Tap an Arrow Key or Double Click the Left Mouse Button.
